hero.title: Big Beautiful Bill Calculator
hero.description: Calculate your federal and state taxes instantly with our free US Remittance Tax Calculator. Updated for H.R.1 One Big Beautiful Bill with new deductions, SALT cap increases, and tax-free tips provisions.
hero.tip: Free, accurate, and updated for all current tax law changes

how_it_works.title: How Our Big Beautiful Bill Tax Tool Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Calculate your taxes in 4 simple steps using our H.R.1 Tax Calculator

steps.title: Enter Your Income Details
steps.description: Input your gross income, filing status, and state. Our Big Beautiful Bill Calculator automatically applies the correct federal tax brackets and rates.

steps.title: Add Deductions & Credits
steps.description: Include itemized deductions, the new $40,000 SALT cap, child tax credits ($2,500), and business income for QBI deduction using our One Big Beautiful Bill Tax Calculator.

steps.title: Apply New H.R.1 Benefits
steps.description: Add tips and overtime income to benefit from the US Tax Law Calculator provisions - tips deduction for income under $160k and overtime deduction up to $12,500 single/$25,000 married.

steps.title: Get Instant Results
steps.description: View your complete tax breakdown including federal, state taxes, effective rates, and potential savings. Our American Tax Reform Calculator shows exactly what you owe or your refund amount.

items.title: Real-Time Tax Calculations

image.alt: Big Beautiful Bill Calculator interface showing tax calculations

feature2.name: feature2
feature2.label: Advanced Features
feature2.title: Maximize Your Tax Savings
feature2.description: Our Big Beautiful Bill Calculator includes all the latest tax-saving features from the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

items.title: Enhanced SALT Deduction
items.description: Maximize your state and local tax deductions with the new $40,000 cap. Our American Tax Reform Calculator automatically optimizes between standard and itemized deductions based on your income level.

items.title: Tips & Overtime Benefits
items.description: Take advantage of new H.R.1 Tax Calculator provisions for tax-free tips (income under $160k) and overtime deduction (up to $12,500 single/$25,000 married filing jointly) using our US Tax Law Calculator.

items.title: Business Income Optimization
items.description: Calculate QBI deduction at 23% for qualified business income. Our Big Beautiful Bill Calculator helps maximize deductions for self-employed and business owners.

feature3.name: feature3
feature3.label: Step-by-Step
feature3.title: Simple Tax Calculation Process
feature3.description: Follow our guided process to calculate your taxes accurately and maximize your deductions with the Big Beautiful Bill Calculator.

items.title: Income & Filing Status
items.description: Start with your gross income and filing status. Our calculator automatically detects your tax bracket using federal rates: 10%, 12%, 22%, 24%, 32%, 35%, and 37%.

items.title: Deductions & Credits
items.description: Add itemized deductions, apply the new $40,000 SALT cap, claim child tax credits ($2,500), and other applicable credits using our US Tax Law Calculator for maximum savings.

items.title: H.R.1 Specific Benefits
items.description: Include tips income (tax-free under $160k), overtime deduction benefits, and enhanced QBI deduction using our American Tax Reform Calculator.

items.title: Final Results & Planning
items.description: Review your complete tax summary, effective rates, and get recommendations for tax planning strategies with our Big Beautiful Bill Calculator.

faq.name: faq
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our Big Beautiful Bill Tax Calculator features.

items.title: What is the Big Beautiful Bill Calculator and how does it work?
items.description: The Big Beautiful Bill Calculator is a free US Remittance Tax Calculator based on H.R.1, the One Big Beautiful Bill Act. It helps you calculate federal and state taxes including new provisions for tips deduction, overtime benefits, increased SALT deduction cap to $40,000, and enhanced QBI deduction at 23%. Simply enter your income information and our US Tax Law Calculator does the rest.

items.title: How accurate is the H.R.1 Tax Calculator for my tax situation?
items.description: Our American Tax Reform Calculator uses official tax brackets and provisions directly from the One Big Beautiful Bill Act. The calculator includes all current federal rates (10%, 12%, 22%, 24%, 32%, 35%, 37%) and state tax rates. While highly accurate for most situations, complex scenarios may require professional tax advisor consultation.

items.title: Is the Big Beautiful Bill Calculator really free to use?
items.description: Yes! Our US Remittance Tax Calculator is completely free with no hidden fees, registration requirements, or premium features. You can access all features of our American Tax Reform Calculator without providing payment information or creating an account.

items.title: What new tax features are included in the US Tax Law Calculator?
items.description: The One Big Beautiful Bill Tax Calculator includes major updates: tips tax deduction for income under $160k, overtime deduction up to $12,500 single/$25,000 married, increased SALT cap to $40,000, higher child tax credit of $2,500, permanent QBI deduction at 23%, and enhanced itemized deductions. All features comply with the latest H.R.1 provisions.

items.title: Can I save my calculations from the H.R.1 Tax Calculator?
items.description: Yes, our Big Beautiful Bill Calculator allows you to export your tax calculations as PDF reports or save detailed summaries. This helps you keep records for your files or share results with tax professionals while maintaining complete privacy and security.
